title: Bank Soul/s: 1AP
text:
If you want to leave lasting damage to your opponent's Effigy, you've gotta get those Souls in the bank!

Your Hero must be adjacent to your Effigy to perform this action. Heroes can Bank multiple Souls for 1AP. Once Banked , Souls are no longer Bound to the Hero and remain Banked until end-of-game. This secures your harvested Souls so they cannot be lost.
